resources.name: Bottom Five Reviews
resources.description:
**API description:** To fetch five bottom-most reviews for a particular movie.

**Request Parameter:**

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| movieId | string **path paramter** `required` | The unique identifier for each movie. This identifier is generated by mongoose db. |

Request Body:

`No request parameters are required.`

**Response:**

Status codes and messages:

| Status Code | Response Status | Message |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `201 Created` | **S**uccess | Successfully added a review! |
| `400 Bad Request` | **F**ailure | Sorry, couldn't read data |
| `401 Bad Request` | **F**ailure | Mandatory parameter missing |
| `500 Internal Server Error` | **F**ailure | Some server error occurred! |

**response body:**

| Attribute | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| rating | string | The rating given by each user. |
| user | string | The userId of the user generated by mongoose db. |
| text | string | Review given by the user. |
| _id | string | The unique Id of each review created by mongoose DB. |

resources.name: Movie-Review app API documentation
resources.description:
These apis are required for user authentication and management and movie reviews management.

## Request and Response Formats

All API endpoints accept and return data in JSON format.

## Error Handling

The API returns appropriate HTTP status codes and error messages to indicate the success or failure of each request.

## User Management APIs

### Endpoints

Explore the following endpoints to interact with the User Management API:

- `POST /users/signup`: Sign up a new user.
- `POST /users/login`: Log in a user to our app.
- `POST /users/{userId}/changePassword`: Change the password for a particular user.
- `POST /users/{userId}/profile/updateProfilePicture`: Update the profile picture for a particular user.
- `POST /users/updateContact/{email}`: Update contact information for a user.
- `GET /users/phone/{phoneNumber}`: Retrieve user details by phone number.
    

## Movie Review Management APIs

### Endpoints

Explore the following endpoints to interact with the Movie Review Management API:

- `POST /movies/{movieId}/reviews`: Allow users to add their rating and review for a particular movie.
- `GET /movies/{movieId}/reviews`: Get reviews with user details for a specific movie by its unique ID.
- `GET /movies/{movieId}/reviews/topFiveReviews`: Get the top five reviews for a specific movie by its unique ID.
- `GET /movies/{movieId}/reviews/bottomFiveReviews`: Get the bottom five reviews for a specific movie by its unique ID.
    

## Getting Started

MovieReview app API provides a secure and easy way for your users to interact with our app. Kindly follow the detailed API documentation to seamlessly integrate these APIs with your app.

**Request Parameter:**

| Parameter | Type | Description |

resources.name: Add Review And Rating
resources.description:
**API description:** Add a review and ratings to a specefic movie.

**Request Parameter:**

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| movieId | string **path paramter** `required` | The unique identifier for each movie. This identifier is generated by the mongoose db. |

Request Body:

`Content Type : JSON`

| Attribute | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| rating | number | The user given rating on a scale of 1 to 10. |
| review | string | The text content of the review. This should contain the user's feedback or comments about the movie. |
| userId | string | The unique id of the user. This unique Id is generated by mongoose db. |

**Response:**

Status codes and messages:

| Status Code | Response Status | Message |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `201 Created` | **S**uccess | Successfully added a review! |
| `400 Bad Request` | **F**ailure | Sorry, couldn't add the review. |
| `401 Bad Request` | **F**ailure | Mandatory parameter missing |
| `500 Internal Server Error` | **F**ailure | Some server error occurred! |

**`reviewResponse`** **object:**

| Attribute | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| title | string | The name of the movie. |
| releaseYear | number | The year of release of the movie. |
| genre | string | The genre of the movie. |
| director | string | The director of the movie. |
| actors | `array of object` | The cast of the movie. |
| _id | string | The unique Id of the movie created by mongoose DB. |
| language | string | The language of the movie |
| country | string | The country movie was released in |
| rating | number | The rating given by the user |
| plot | string | A brief description about the plot of the movie. |
| awards | string | The list of awards received by the movie. |
| trailerUrl | string | The trailer of the movie. |

resources.description:

address | number

string | The phone number of the User. | | _id | string | The unique Id of the destination created by the mongoose DB. |

string | The phone number of the User. | | _id | string | The unique Id of the destination created by mongoose DB. |

resources.name: Sign Up User API
resources.description:
**API description:** This API allows users to create an account with your platform. It adds a new user to your database. **Parameter:** - no parameters required **Request Attributes:** `Content Type : JSON`
AttributeTypeDescription
email
string required
The email of the User.
password
string
The password for the user account.
profilePictureUrl
string
The URL of the profile picture uploaded by the user.
username
string
The username specified by the user.
phoneNumber

number
The Phone number of the user.

address
string
The address of the user.
**Response Attributes:** **`Response codes and Messages`** | Statuscode | Response Status | Message | | --- | --- | --- | | `201 Created` | **S**uccess | Successfully Signed Up. | | `400 Bad Request` | **F**ailure | Sorry, couldn't create user. | | `500 Internal Server Error` | **F**ailure | Some server error occured! | | `401 Bad Request` | **F**ailure | User already exists. Please sign in. | **`Response Body:`** **Response Object**: **`signUpResponse`** | Attribute | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | email | string | The email of the account that has been created. | | password | string | The password saved in our database. | | profilePictureUrl | string | The url of the profile picture uploaded by the user. | | username | number | The username of the user. | | phoneNumber | number | The phone number of the user. | | _id | string | The unique Id of the user account created by mongoose DB. | | address | string | The address of the user provided during account creation |
